DocLocalization.Name: Gruppe von Profilen mit Material - Verwendung (bei Verjüngung)

DocAttribute.Name: ForProfileEndSet
DocAttribute.Documentation: The second _IfcMaterialProfileSet_ set to which the usage is applied.

DocAttribute.Name: CardinalEndPoint
DocAttribute.Documentation: Index reference to a significant point in the second section profile. Describes how this section is aligned relative to the axis of the member it is associated with. This parametric specification of profile alignment can be provided redundantly to the explicit alignment defined by ForProfileSet.MaterialProfiles[\*].Profile.
